name: Rayman 100 Levels
summary: Rayman 100 Levels is a compilation released in the Netherlands in 1999. It includes Rayman By His Fans and Rayman 60 Levels, both in English. The text on the packaging, as well as the on-disc PDF manual, are in Dutch. The CD contains an incomplete version of the soundtrack, also seen in the North-American release of Rayman Forever, with the Image and Caves tracks shortened, and the Jungle track erroneously playing the ambience portion of the Caves music.
